captions.text:
They had to bring
a female in.

<i>Wipe the dribble away</i>
<i>from your bubblin' lips.</i>

Rub vaseline
all over your heinie

And tell you that
it's special and different
from everyone else's.

Does she tuck you
in, ronnie?

Give you a little kiss
on your forehead?

Tell you everything's
gonna be okay?

I've had enough
of you, mantooth.

This is gonna end
right here, right now.

Brick, where'd you get
a hand grenade?

If you're gonna
have a fight,

Then don't forget
channel 2 news with me,

You dirtbags have been
in third place for five years.

Yeah?  Well, you're about
to be in dead place.

Public news team is taking
a break from its pledge drive

The sewers run red
with burgundy's blood.

title: Anchorman: The Legend of Ron Burgundy (7/8) Movie CLIP - Wanna Dance? (2004) HD
